name: arabia

a large peninsula (= a long piece of land that sticks out into the sea) in West Asia, that includes Saudi Arabia, Yemen, Oman, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, and the United Arab Emirates: This is a songbird of the finch family, native to Africa, Arabia, and South Asia. Oman is on the eastern edge of the Arabian peninsula.

Coffee was grown in Ethiopia and traded across the Red Sea to the Arabian peninsula.Throughout history, the Arabian Peninsula has traditionally been called "Arabia".
